  • Dependencies

Dependencies¶

Night Tools relies heavily on the Scipy ecosystem, as well as command line tools like GDAL, CloudCompare, and LAStools.

Python Standard Library¶

  • os

  • re

  • shutil

  • subprocess

  • multiprocessing

Python packages¶

  • geopandas

  • matplotlib

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • PIL

  • rasterio

  • scipy

  • shapely

  • skimage

  • sklearn

Other software¶

  • CloudCompare

  • GDAL

  • LAStools

  • PDAL
